--------------------------------------------------------------------


Children worldwide are protected by a select group of custodians: Santa Claus, Tooth Fairy, Easter Bunny and Sandman. It is they who ensure the children's innocence and legends. But an evil spirit, the Pitch, intends to turn all dreams into nightmares, waking up scared in all children. To combat this powerful adversary, the moon appoint a new guardian to help the group: Jack Frost, a little boy "invisible" that controls the winter. Unaware of his own vocation as guardian, he embarks on an adventure in which you will discover so much about children as about their own past.
